title: ChameleonMini Workshop
description:
Details about using and programming ChameleonMini from the makers
------------If you missed the workshop and want to buy a Chameleon. We are at the Italian Hackers Embassy at day 3 from 3pm to 5pm.You might also follow the thread at GitHub [https://github.com/emsec/ChameleonMini/issues/244]------------In this workshop we will introduce you to RFID security and the ChameleonMini. We show you how to read and emulate cards. Moreover we outline some programming guide lines. Besides the theoretical introduction we will have enough space for practical tasks and questions. Here is a small video collection of the [https://www.dailymotion.com/ChameleonMini ChameleonMini in action].[[File:ChameleonMiniWorkshopFlyer.png|thumb|center]]
